concept.title: Welcome!

conbody.p: Decorating sugar cookies with royal icing is a challenge. However, the outcome is often beautiful (and delicious!). Custom, hand-decorated cookies are expensive, so learning to decorate on your own can be very rewarding!

Detailed decorating takes focus; it can be a way to slow down, relax, and direct your attention towards something besides life's normal stressors. The best part of sugar cookie decorating is that if you make a mistake, you can just eat it!
